house_listing.house_description: 3-year new builder home on 19.8 acres. bring your horses. 40x30 outbuilding. Arena. 72x36 barn with 2nd story for storage. Sprinkler. Trees. POOL/HOT TUB.This is a lovely home on lots of acreage. Gameroom, walk-in closets. garden tub, microwave in kitchen, iron fence, a well, lots of deluxe feature, and 3800 sq. ft. If you are looking for MORE than ordinary, this is it!
